appraisal.reason: Please be advised that, per this newsletter, Saturday Confessions are 10:00–11:00 and 17:00–17:50, not until 18:00. Weekday Confessions are 12:00–12:20, and Sunday Confessions are 10:00–10:30 and 12:00–12:30. Kindly consult this schedule for planning.

Per the newsletter, Confession is offered Monday to Friday from 12:15pm to 12:40pm, not 12:00pm to 12:40pm. On Saturdays, Confession runs from 5:30pm to 5:55pm, not until 6:00pm. No Sunday Confession is advertised.

name: Our Lady of Mount Carmel & St Simon Stock
